feed.title: CMental
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: Comment Motiver 2?
entry.content:
Header 1

You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

Jekyll requires blog post files to be named according to the following format:

YEAR-MONTH-DAY-title.MARKUP

Header 2

Where YEAR is a four-digit number, MONTH and DAY are both two-digit numbers, and MARKUP is the file extension representing the format used in the file. After that, include the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
entry.summary: Header 1 You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

entry.title: Latéraux : Theo Hernandez
entry.content:
Latéraux : Theo Hernandez, De Sciglio, Marusic, Semedo et Hamari Traoré, des solutions pour le PSG

Theo Hernandez, De Sciglio, Marusic, Semedo ou Hamari Traoré… Pour pallier les fins de contrat de Thomas Meunier et Layvin Kurzawa, le Paris-SG prospecte des deux côtés de sa défense.

Avec trois joueurs en fin de contrat (Thiago Silva, Thomas Meunier et Layvin Kurzawa), le Paris-SG devrait considérablement alléger sa masse salariale, de l’ordre de 25 M€ annuels, en défense. Cette marge de manoeuvre financière est appréciable pour se renforcer, surtout sur les côtés. À gauche, Juan Bernat (27 ans) est encore sous contrat pour une saison. Kurzawa ne sera plus sa doublure. Proche de la Juventus en janvier, l’international français (13 sélections) a toujours des touches en Italie (Inter et AC Milan) ainsi qu’en Angleterre (Arsenal).
entry.summary: Latéraux : Theo Hernandez, De Sciglio, Marusic, Semedo et Hamari Traoré, des solutions pour le PSG
